post.body: wow! I'm only at 989. You're a power Twitterer!
I think he saw the cats doing it & figured he was missing out. :-)
let me rephrase: since I don't have kids or cats with the good sense NOT to eat tinsel, I don't get to have it. :-)
I used to love the silver tinsel strands, but since it's not good for kids or cats, haven't been able to have it in years.
I love stringing popcorn for the tree, but can't keep it on. The higher strands all have gaps from Mikey having a bite or 2.
surprising, actually, that kids didn't hear it & wake up. At least the Star Trek ornaments are safe in the cabinet!
no, kids are still quiet. Cats, on the other hand, decided to attack popcorn strings on tree & tipped it over. Had to pick up.
then if they don't need it, they can return, but they'll have it & not have to wait for it if they do need it. Parents. argh!
that they'll be fine, as they're keeping him for 2-3 days, like he'll be up to par after that. I told her to order stuff, and
plus, I'm trying to get mom to get dr. to order helpful stuff, like walker, tall toilet seat frame, etc. Mom keeps saying
one sis & big nephew coming home for x-mas on Thursday, dad will be out of hospital around then (they said 2-3 days stay).
the big job is trying to keep 80 yo mom from doing all the caretaking after surgery. Don't want her getting hurt either.
yes, they finally found he's got a cyst between vertebraes. Supposed to be simple procedure, but he's 85 yo.
most is done; ended up doing gift cards. dad's having surgery Monday, so I figured do gift cards, not knowing time constraints.
Finally gave up watching & told the boys if they were going to be terrors, they could be terrors in bed. David is such a teen.
that sounds like a great idea! If Mikey didn't have therapy this morning, we'd do that, too. :-)
http://www.hungerartists.com/ The Flying Spaghetti Monster show is back.
thanks - we can use all the prayers we can get. It's been an hour & a half - he should be out soon.
@TooManyHats I have another reason for keeping myself occupied - my dad has back surgery in 2 hrs. I'm a bit stressed.
I sure did. In fact - I just caught david doing it, too! Going to go frost gingerbread cookies, making him help.
oooh, what kind? we're thinking of making haystacks (PB& butterscotch chips melted & mixed w/ chow main noodles & marshmallows)
Morning, A!
just got Twitpic up & running. Now I have hungry kids to feed - will try to post more pics later!
not sure - haven't really looked into it yet. Oh! Just realized you're prob. looking at it on a phone - really tiny!
finally finished the fridge - started freezer, decided to leave for another day. Got chicken out for chicken & dumplings. yum!
no, I just sent to you - figured Hats was busy with daughter getting ready for performance. did you get?
just sent 3 e-mails with ratings & info. I'd check the customer ratings at sears.com to see what real people say, too.
am sending you some cr info on dishwashers - is your earthlink e-mail address still good, or should I use a different one?
no, haven't been there. looked it up, saw one in Brea - may try that! Wanna go? will be taking boys to g'mas soon.
I'd love to, but not sure yet if I can. Still have to look for a washing machine, been putting it off. Now might be good time.
those helpful christmas elves must have used hot water & shrunk everyone's. :-)
boys may be going to grandma's tomorrow afternoon, though, if anyone wants to do a bit of gaming. Now - laundry. ugh!
wish I could, but I have both boys today, and it would be too crazy trying to keep an eye on Mikey.
connected=good, but wrong connection=chaos. :-) Do you think they'll do it today, or wait till next week to hook you up?
I have the bbc one, I can burn her a copy.
Has she seen the bbc production of Hitchhikers? Definitely better (& more campy) than the recent movie.
Such a cool game! Thanks for having me over. I love games, and that one is fun!
whoo hoo - I hope you were serious, cause I'm on my way!
still waiting for in laws to pick up boys. sigh. hope there's enough time to come play a game!
uh oh - I hear rustling & rumbling from the other room. Breakfast making is imminent! Have to tweet later - starving boys to feed. :-)
btw, it's all quiet here and has been for an hour. I'm on 2nd cup of coffee & really enjoying the morning. :-)
still have to get present for mom's b-day next Friday. I have difficult mom to buy for - she just wants kids "To be happy & healthy". Argh.
this is fun to look at: Castles For Sale. http://tinyurl.com/wbq9q just in case you're looking to buy one. :-)
argh - forgot to set the coffee pot again. I'm not good at waiting!
morning, all. I forgot to set the coffee pot on auto pilot last night, so am waiting for my brew.
whew - worn out. will know more about dad by morning. positive thoughts! signing out for the evening.
got the call. dad is out of surgery & in recovery. doc says it went good. !!!
sis called - dad just went into surgery. was supposed to go in at 3, but was delayed. argh!
going to miss park day today, but the way it's pouring out, I'm happy not to venture out. Maybe we'll bake some new cookies!
http://twitpic.com/t326 - Mikey eating the popcorn off the tree
here's the pic I took last night of Mikey eating the popcorn off the tree. Between him and the cats, we have a very strange looking tree.
it's raining, all right. I'm so not used to it, I kept waking up. David, too. Mikey, on the other hand, could sleep thru hurricane. :-)
got photos of my son eating the popcorn off the tree & taking the stockings off the fireplace & wearing them. Now - to bed. Whoo hoo!
just saw T's youngest dance in the Nutcracker at the BP mall - she was adorable! Glad we got to see.
doesn't seem to matter how late I go to bed - I still wake up early. At least the coffee is awake, too. :-)
cleaning out the fridge. If I don't tweet back later today, send reinforcements. :-)
New washer coming this Wednesday! Went with @TooManyHats to the Sears outlet & got a good deal. Now I'm procrastinating cleaning the patio.
someone must've switched all my pants - they all seem too tight. :-)
oh, fun night, spent with my friends & adopted family. Had a great day, now to bed. Happy Christmas, all!
Cats are having a blast with the gift bags & paper. Can't pick up the trash yet - they're having too much fun. :-)
